thread.section_title: Cabinetgiant Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cabinetgiant | www.cabinetgiant.com
thread.title: D A Hartz
thread.title_full: Cabinetgiant reviewed by D A Hartz

author: D A Hartz
title: D A Hartz
text: I needed a cabinet to take the place of the overhead cabinets I had recently tore down that would fit under my raised island counter. This particular cabinet fit perfectly. The particular style/color fit in well with my existing cabinets. When I tried to adjust the doors to line up with each other I was still off enough that I decided to have the doors open the same direction versus away from each other. Not what I had planned but it works fine. The price was good and shipping was quick. As far as overall quality I am quite happy with this application but I will note that the finished sides at the bottom tended to splinter a bit so I would hesitate to buy this particular style for my future remodel. I do like the fact there is no particle board.
